definition: car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
station/to stand/to halt/to stop/branch of a company or organization/website

sentences.english: It's diagonally across the street from the bus stop.
sentences.chinese: 它就在汽車站的斜對面。

sentences.english: Roadside newspaper sellers all prefer bus stops.
The bus stop in Station Road.
The small shop across from the bus stop is Mr. Wang's.
sentences.chinese: 汽車站對面的那家小店是王先生開的。

sentences.english: Jack backed against the car and rose, Glock in hand.
sentences.chinese: 傑克背靠着汽車站起身來，格洛克手槍已經握在手上。

sentences.english: Excuse me how can I get to the car stine?
This afternoon the students of our class went to the bus stop to help the drivers clean the buses.
sentences.chinese: 今天下午我們班同學去汽車站幫助司機叔叔清洗車輛。

sentences.english: Don't be afraid of going the station with her.
sentences.chinese: 不要害怕跟她去共公汽車站。

sentences.english: There is one bus station on the corner of Huanghe Road and Wusi Road.
sentences.chinese: 在黃河路和五四路交匯處的拐角上有一個汽車站。
希望做過汽車站的朋友支招。

sentences.english: As far as I know, there is a bank within a hundred meters of the bus stop.
sentences.chinese: 據我所知，距離汽車站不到一百米就有一個銀行。

sentences.english: I'll race you to the bus stop.
sentences.chinese: 我要和你賽一賽，看誰先跑到汽車站。

sentences.english: Criminals troll bus stations for young runaways .
sentences.chinese: 罪犯們在汽車站搜索年輕的逃跑者。

sentences.english: I have to transfer to the NO. 11 bus, but where is the bus stop?
sentences.chinese: 我需要換乘11路公交車，但是汽車站在哪？

sentences.english: Do you know what tour bus is going to the thehproposisr?
sentences.chinese: 南山汽車站白石洲你清楚幾路公共汽車去劇院嗎？

sentences.english: The bus stop is a short walk from our school.
sentences.chinese: 汽車站離我們黌舍沒有遠，走一會女便到。

definition: to take the car, bus, train etc
south/south side/southern part/to the south of
to make a detour/to take the long route
to transfer/to change trains, buses etc
Cebu, a province (and a city) in the Philippines (Tw)
Ningde prefecture level city in Fujian
shuttle bus ferrying passengers between train stations on two different rail lines
to change train (plane, bus etc)/transfer between modes of transport
